admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project provides assistance
            to RTO Titograd in restoring about 90 km of railway lines
            damaged in the earthquakes of April 15 and May 24, 1979 and
            in extending yard facilities in Titograd and Bar. Benefits
            comprise the restoration of traffic over the railway lines
            to an effective level. Their closure or restriction to
            limited usage would affect adversely all sectors of the
            economy and the rehabilitation of the whole damaged area.
